111.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful day in Konoha, and and Team 7 had just finished training for the day, and had no missions for today either. Kakashi had already left, and the three genin were just about to do the same when something caught Naruto's attention. He saw something sticking out of a bush. He walked over to it and pulled it out to see what it was. It was a scroll. The blond ninja then opened it up to read its contents. "It looks instructions for a jutsu."

"What kind of jutsu?" Sakura asked.

"Don't know. It doesn't say." Naruto said. "Guess we'll just have to try it out to find out what it does." he said as he started doing the necessary seals to preform it.

"I don't think thats such a good idea. You have no idea what it could do." Sakura said.

"She's right. We should take that to someone like Kakashi-sensei before you try it out."

"Ah, don't be so scared you two. It'll be fine." he said, just as he finished perfoming it. There was a flash of light that filled the three's vision.

"Hey, you told me to hit you with everything I've got. I told you if you got hurt, you brought it on yourself." the pink haired girl replied.

"I know. But you're also getting stronger, so I guess I underestimate you a bit." he said. He then caught sight of something in a nearby bush, and bent down to pick it up. He found that it was a scroll. "Huh? whats this?" he questioned as he opened it up. Inside was a seal in some instructions on some seal to do, and writing in a language he couldn't read. "Wonder what this is? I think I'll try it out..." he said as he began to do the seal listed.

"Hey, be careful. You don't know what that does." Sakura warned.

"Don't worry, I will." he said just as he finished the seal. There was then a sudden flash...

As the flash of light died down, and Naruto's vision cleared, he found that he was standing in a different location in the training ground, and not the spot that he was standing before. He then looked over to where he had been standing before before, and was surprised by what he saw. Standing where he had been was Sakura, though she was not as moments ago. She was now dressed in what appeared to be his own orange and black clothes, tailored to fit her perfectly, and around her forehead was his own black headband, and her pink hair was now styled into his usual, spiky style.

He was then drawn to look downward at his own appearance, and was once again surprised. Like his team mate now wore his clothes, he now wore her's. He was dressed in her red sleeveless top, black shorts with pinkish skirt, and black boots with heels. If he could have seen his head, he would have seen his blonde hair had been styled like Sakura's had been, and with her red headband tying it up.

11212.content:
"Is something wrong, Sakura?" Sakura asked as she looked over and noticed how confused he looked.

"Huh?" Naruto questioned. 'Why did Sakura just call me Sakura?' he wondered to himself. "Uh, I'm fine."

"Well, okay then." Sakura said. "Hey, you wanna get some ramen? I'm starving!"

'Shes acting just like me!' he thought, he then noticed that though everything rlse had changed, he was still holding the scroll from before. 'Does it have something to do with the scroll?' Uh, thanks, but not today, uh, Naruto." he said.

"Wanna check out the scroll you found, huh? Alright, maybe some other time. See ya later!" Sakura said as she started walking back to the village.

Looking at the scroll, he opened it again, and found that the text inside was now readable. "Life swap jutsu? Using this jutsu will allow the user to switch the lives of any two people they choose. Those affected by this technique will switch lives with the other affected by it. Only those touching this scroll will be aware of change, and those who weren't will treat those affected by the technique as if they are the person whose life they now occupy, and those who were affected by this jutsu and not touching this scroll will believe that they are the person whose life they occupy. When people are affected, they will switch abilities, including bloodlines, with those whose life they are in. When using this jutsu, the user must be holding this scroll and think of the two they wish to use it on, and they must both be within range to be affected. If the user does not think of anyone when using it, it wil swap the user with another nearby person at random." Naruto said as he read the instructions out loud. "So then, now I've got Sakura's life, and she has mine? And no one will know otherwise?"

1121222122121.content:
Naruto looked on at Tsunade, who now stood where he had been just moments before, now dressed in the clothes that Sakura would often wear. Glancing downwards, he saw himself, now sitting at the desk, and wearing Tsunade's clothes. Both of their current outfits had been adjusted to fit the ones who now wore them.

"Sakura?" Naruto adressed her.

"What did you need, Lady Tsunade?" Tsunade asked. Even if her body hadn't changed, she now believed that she was Sakura.

"Looks like I'm the Hokage now." he thought to himself with a smirk. He then thought of how he had been called here before, and then thought up a quick excuse since he didn't really know the real reason Tsunade had called him there. "Sakura, I just wanted you to practice with the basics medical jutsu today. You know its important not to become rusty."

Tsunade looked a bit unsure, and Naruto knew it was a bit of a flimsy excuse, but she didn't really have any reason to doubt him so she replied "Uh, okay Lady Tsunade."

"Good. Now, if you don't mind, I'm going to be a bit busy."

"Of course, Lady Tsunade." Tsunade replied before leaving to do as Naruto had told her.

Now that he was alone, Naruto looked around the office. "Now that I'm Hokage, what should I do first?" he thought to himself. It was then that a mischievous grin appeared on his face as he came up with an idea. Looking at the Life Swap Jutsu scroll, he thought up the perfect way to use it on people. Since as far as anyone else was concerned, he was Tsunade, the Hokage of the village, he could call in anyone he wanted. That would give him the perfect way to pick the people he wanted to swap around.

"Now, who should I swap first?" he wondered aloud. It was shortly after he said that when Shizune entered into the office.

"I'm back, Lady Tsunade." she said to him.

"Hm, I guess Shizune would be a decent first victim." he thought. "Now the only question is, who should I swap her with? I guess it should be someone that would make this funny, seeing them acting as Shizune and Shizune acting as them." After thinking a bit, Naruto got an idea of who. "Shizune, could you please bring me..."
1121222122121.title: Himself (as Sakura)

11212221221211.content:
“Could you send in Shino, please?”

“Right away, milady,” Shizune said as she left the office to perform her task.

As soon as Shizune left, Naruto searched the Hokage’s desk looking for a valid excuse to call on Shino. Finally, he found a mission that seemed perfect for Shino’s abilities and could be done solo. He put the mission in front of him on the desk just as Shizune walked in with Shino.

“What do you need, Lady Hokage?” Shino asked in his usual monotone.

Naruto smiled as he said, “I’ve got a special mission for you.”

Before continuing, Naruto opened the scroll and allowed the special jutsu to work its magic. When the light died down, Naruto struggled to contain his happiness.

Beside his desk holding Tonton (Tsunade’s pet pig) was Shino, but he was dressed in Shizune’s clothes. He wore a blue kimono with white trimming held with an obi sash while low-heeled sandals adorned his feet. Shino’s face was completely visible to Naruto now, including his brown eyes. “Why doesn’t he like to show himself to people?” Naruto wondered.

Looking to the front of the desk, Naruto could only guess that Shizune was standing waiting to be given Shino’s mission. Shino’s clothes, which consisted of black pants, a black knee-length high-collared shirt and hunter green coat with hood, obstructed most of her body from view except for her nose and eyes. Even then, Shino’s sunglasses covered her eyes.

“Lady Tsunade,” Shizune said, now with a monotone much like Shino’s, “what is this special mission you have for me?”

Snapping back into reality, Naruto told Shizune, “Well, Shino, I’m sending you on a mission to the Land of Rice Paddies for a week. The citizens could use your expertise on insects to help create a method of farming that ensures insect swarms won’t be a problem.”

Shizune nodded and said, “Understood.” She then turned around and walked out the door. As soon as they were alone, Shino walked in front of Naruto’s desk, gave a small smile and said, “I thought for sure that kind of mission would make Shino show a little emotion.”

Naruto looked at Shino and said, “Well, there’s still time for him to come out of his shell, Shizune. Just give it time.”

Getting a more serious tone, Shino said, “Anyway, Milady, I wanted to ask if you got those forms filled out yet. The Daimyo won’t appreciate it if they’re late this time.”

Naruto handed Shino the papers and said, “Here, I got them done before I spoke with Sakura.”

Shino happily accepted the papers and said, “I’ll get these sent out right away. Is there anything else you need, Milady?”

Naruto said, “Not at the moment. I’ll probably be asking for more people to be coming in before the day is done.”

“Very well, Lady Tsunade. Call me if you need me for anything.” With that, Shino walked out of the room.

Naruto burst out laughing as soon as Shino left. “This scroll really is incredible! Shino’s finally has a personality! Man, if I could get him to show emotions, who knows what it could do with the others?”

Naruto rummaged through the papers in the desk and fished out a file on a certain kunoichi. After getting a grin, Naruto called out, “Shizune, send in Hinata!”

What does Naruto have planned for Hinata
11212221221211.title: Shino

112122212212111.content:
As Shino as Shizune went to retrieve Hinata, Naruto thought of who he could possibly swap her with. However, he couldn't seem to decide on what would be funniest. There were plenty of people that it would be funny to see act like Hinata, and plenty of people it would be funny to see Hinata act like.

As he contemplated the idea, he thought of something. He could swap Hinata into Shizune's life, which would put Shino into her life. That way, it would be hilarious to see Shino act like the timid Hyuga girl, and putting Hinata into Shizune's life, she would always be around for him to "save for later" in a way if he came up with an idea of whose life to swap her into.

His decision made, he looked around the pile of papers for a mission that would be a decent excuse to have called Tsunade. After a minute of looking, he found one that would be good enough, and placed it in front of his desk and waited for Hinata, and fortunately, he didn't have to wait long. A few minutes later, Shino entered in with Hinata.

"What do you need, Lady Hokage?" Hinata asked in her usual timid tone, though Naruto noticed it lacked the stutter he would always hear from her.

"Huh, I wonder why that is?" he thought to himself briefly. "Oh well, not important." "Hinata, I've got a mission for you." he told her. Then like with Shino and Shizune, Naruto opened the scroll and used the Life Swap Jutsu once more. When the light died down, Naruto managed to contain his laughter once again.

Where Shino had been previously, Hinata now stood dressed in Shizune’s clothes. He also noticed something else, in that her eyes seemed different.

Looking over to where Hinata had stood, Shino was now in her place. He was now dressed in her lavender and cream colored jacket, blue pants, and a had the headband tied around his neck. He also noticed that Shino's eyes were now white, possessing the Hyuga clan's Byakugan.

"What kind of mission, Lady Tsunade?" Shino asked, now speaking with Hinata's timid tone.

"Well, a nearby village has been having some problems with wild animals ambushing traders on the routes between their villages. I want you to go with them and guard them from attacks since your Byakugan would be perfect to spot any attackers before they reach the group."

"Uh, okay Lady Tsunade." Shino replied, sounding slightly nervous. He then bowed politely before leaving the office.

"Are you sure Hinata is up for such a mission alone, Lady Tsunade?" Hinata asked, sounding a bit concerned.

"I'm sure she can handle it by herself." Naruto replied. After Hinata left the room, Naruto once again burst out laughing. "Man, this is hilarious! Seeing Shino go from acting like himself to acting like Shizune, then to acting like Hinata is a riot! Now, who should my next victim be?" Naruto said as he looked though the files on the desk, and eventually came to one on a certain ninja. With another grin, Naruto called out to Hinata. "Shizune, bring in Rock Lee next!"


Now, what does Naruto have planned for Lee?

1121222122121112.title: Swap him with someone else

11212221221211121.content:
"Shizune, bring Shikamaru in here as well."

"Very well, Lady Tsunade," Hinata said as she left to get the two shinobi.

Naruto used the time Hinata was taking to get the two to make a short list of other people to swap. However, not wanting Hinata or anyone else to take a peek, he decided to hide it carefully in one of the pockets of Tsunade's coat.

When Hinata arrived with Lee and Shikamaru, Naruto wasted no time in switching the two. He again struggled to contain himself when he saw Shikamaru in Lee's green spandex jumpsuit and jacket while Lee stood uninterested and slightly embarrassed at him.

"Lady Tsunade, what's the new mission?" Lee asked.

"A request to help fortify a trading post on the edge of the Land of Fire. Lee will be going to set up a training regiment for those selected as sentries so they can defend their village. You'll set up defenses against any possible threats to the village. Understand?"

"Yes, Lady Hokage!" Shikamaru yelled out. "Do not worry, my training regiment will make sure the sentries can defeat their enemies with the power of youth!"

"Just shut up, Lee," Lee told Shikamaru. "I assume we'll be leaving right away."

"You have an hour to get everything ready, then you leave for these coordinates," Naruto said, handing Lee a piece of paper with the location of the town in the request. "Don't fail me, Shikamaru."

"I won't," Lee responded. "It's Lee that you should be worried about."

"I will do nothing to slow us down, Shikamaru, you have my word!" Shikamaru cried out in response. "Now, since there is an hour before we leave, I shall do 100 laps around Konoha!" As Shikamaru ran out the door to do his laps, Lee followed, sighing, "What a pain."

Hinata came up to Naruto's side and said, "I don't think you've given out this many assignments before, milady."

"I'm just in that kind of mood. I think the mission requests have been piling up around here," Naruto responded.

"Do you need some time at the Hot Springs? I know how tired you can get after a day like this one."

Naruto took a moment to think about it. On one hand, Naruto could accept Hinata's offer and take a moment to relax before continuing his fun, or he could blow it off and keep having fun swapping people around. "Man, this is tough," he thought. "What should I do?"
11212221221211121.title: Shikamaru

He ignores them and heads into the hot springs
112122212212111211.content:
Naruto thought it over for a bit before ultimately making his decision. "I think I will take a trip to the hot springs for a bit, Shizune." Naruto told Hinata. He figured that a break to relax for a bit wouldn't be a bad thing, and as long as he had Tsunade's life, he could easily pick things up where he left off later. Plus, since he had Tsunade's life, that meant everybody would see and treat him as if he were her, and that meant he could go into the women's side without any trouble.

"Okay then. And I think I'll join you, since I could use a break for a bit, too." Hinata said. And with that, the two left the office and made their way to the village's hot springs.

As he did, Naruto noticed that he didn't seem to have a problem walking in Tsunade's heeled sandals, even though he had never really walked in them before, which he figured was because he had Tsunade's life and she wore them all the time, so that meant he was used to them because she was. It was then that he was reminded that he now had all of Tsunade's skills now in place of his own. 'Huh, so now I've got granny's strength and her medical skills." he thought to himself absentmindedly as he walked with Hinata towards their destination.

As they arrived, before he entered the changing room, out of the corner of his eye he thought he saw something. And when he glanced over, he saw none other than Jiraiya, up to his usual "research." And when he looked closesly, he saw that the old pervert wasn't alone. With him was Sakura, still occupying his own life.

1121222122121112111.content:
Getting an idea as he saw them, Naruto turned to Hinata. "Shizune, you go ahead. I need to use the rest room real quick." he excused himself.

"Alright." she said and went inside.

Naruto then snuck up to the two, though kept his distance so as not to get caught. He then listened to the conversation between the two.

"C'mon Pervy Sage, I want to do some training! Teach me some new techniques!" Sakura begged.

"Not now, Naruto! Can't you see that I'm in the middle of my research?" Jiraiya replied, annoyed by her pestering.

Naruto held back his laughter so as not to be discovered. It was pretty funny watching this play out from the outside instead of doing the begging, plus it was funny seeing Sakura acting like him and begging Jiraiya to train her. But he knew how to make this even funnier. Taking out the scroll, he performed the Life Swap Jutsu once more, and when the flash caused by the technique disappeared, he saw that Sakura and Jiraiya had swapped places. Jiraiya was now dressed in Nruto's usual orange and black attire, while Sakura now wore Jiraiya's green short shirt kimono and matching pants, and red coat, complete with the head plate he wore.

"Now, leave me alone so I can finish my research." Sakura said in a lecherous tone as she picked up where the owner of her current life left off.

"Ugh, fine! Be that way!" Jiraiya complained as he crossed his arms in frustration, giving up for now, but staying nearby as he waited for Sakura to finish.

Naruto wanted to explode with laughter as he watched the interactions between the two. It was absolutely hilarious seeing Sakura act like Jiraiya's perverted self, while seeing Jiraiya himself act like him was an added bonus, a sort of revenge for the times he had been in this situation. Leaving, he made his way back to the entrance of the hot springs, and let out some laughter at what he had just done. "Now me and Sakura are the Sannin, while Tsunade and Jiraiya are our apprentices! Man, this jutsu is great!" he thought as he put the scroll back in his pocket.

He then entered in, and when into the women's locker room and took off Tsunade's clothing that he now wore and deposited them in a locker before walking into the springs, and saw Hinata already inside sitting in the water. He looked around the spring at all the women in the springs, and enjoying the sight of being able to look into the women's side without repercussions for once. He may be male, but everyone else viewed him as Tsunade, so he wouldn't have any problems. He may not be on the Pervy Sage's level, but he was perverted in his own right, and right now, he was in a possition that Jiraiya could only dream of.

"Ah, this is just great." he said as he stepped into the water next to Hinata, refering both to it and his situation.

"I know, it sure is relaxing, Lady Tsunade." Hinata replied.

"I'll say." Naruto said as he took a look around, enjoying the sight of Hinata and the other women relaxing in the springs with him.

Naruto got anxious about trying on outfits because he didn't know if he'd ruin the dresses the store had. He was also afraid Tsunade's bust size would be an issue for her while trying on the dresses. Deciding there was no way to get around it, Naruto stripped down to Sakura's lacy pink underwear and started to put on the first dress. To his amazement, the dress seemed to change to fit his body shape. As soon as the dress was on, he walked out of the dressing room to show off, when he saw Tsunade wearing the same dress, but tailored to fit her body.

"Wow, Sakura! You look totally hot in that!"

Naruto unconsciously struck a pose and said, "You really think so?"

"Oh, yeah! You and I are definitely getting this dress. Now let's try on the others."

This pattern continued for about an hour before Tsunade and Naruto ran out of dresses to try on. Naruto gathered all the dresses they decided to buy and said, "Okay, I'll go pay for these, but you're paying for the next bunch of clothes we buy, Ino."

Tsunade laughed and said, "Fair enough." Naruto walked away, but failed to notice something fall out of his pocket. Tsunade caught the object and said, "Hey, Sakura, you dropped--" but Naruto was already gone in the crowd.

Tsunade looked at the scroll she now held in her hand. Letting curiosity get the better of her, she opened it up and read what was inside. Her face got pale as she kept reading.

Naruto returned with two large bags in his hands. "Man, I'm surprised we even have money left, Ino. I think we might've gone overboard with the shopping."

"That can wait, Sakura," Tsunade said. "You have some explaining to do."

"What for?"

"This fell out of your pocket," Tsunade said as she showed Naruto the scroll. "Where did you get this "Life Swap Jutsu," Sakura? When were you planning to use this?"

Naruto nervously chuckled and said, "Yeah, funny story--"

(In the food court)

"Yeah, I swapped the lives of most of the shinobi in the village, so not everyone is who they say they are."

Tsunade stared at Naruto, then said...

Naruto and Tsunade walked up to the Hokage's office, both anxious to see how things would play out. When they arrived, Kiba (now Shizune) walked up and asked, "Do you have something you need to see Lady Tsunade about?"

"Yes," Tsunade said quickly. "I think I have an idea on how to improve the quality of care of patients on the field."

"Okay, Ino. You may go. Sakura, I'd like to talk with you in private if you don't mind," Tsunade said.

Hinata respectfully bowed and left the room, leaving Naruto to see how Tsunade was going to react.

"Well then we've gotta find out what happened. This is our only clue!" she told him. "C'mon! Follow me!" she said as she made her way into the village.

----------

It was a while after, and the two now sat in the library, having come here to study the scroll and see if they could find anything about what it had done and what it was. Their trip here had been strange. Once back in the village, they had tried not to be seen at first, but they found that no one seemed to react to their state of dress, and weirder yet, they had run into their friends who treated them as if they were the other.

"Here! I think I found something." Sakura called over Naruto to her location, and the book she had open before her. "Its a book of myths, and I found a picture of a scroll with markings that match the one you found."

"Well, then what does it say?" Naruto asked as he sat down.

"It says it the life swap jutsu." Sakura said as she began to read the book out loud. "According to legend, using this jutsu will switch the lives of any two people. Those affected by this technique will switch lives with the other affected by it. Only those affected by the jutsu will be aware of change, and those who weren't will treat those affected by the technique as if they are the person whose life they now. When people are affected, they will switch abilities, including bloodlines, with those whose life they are in."

"Thats sounds strange, but we can't really deny it." Naruto said. "Does it say why the scroll might have gone blank?"

"Lets see... Ah! Here it is..." Sakura said as she read it to herself silently, and her face looked worried.

"Whats wrong, Sakura?"

As the flash of light died down, and Naruto's vision cleared, he found that he was no longer in the training ground with Sakura, who was nowhere to be seen at the moment. "How'd I get here?" he questioned out loud, though since he was the only one around, he got no reply. Deciding to find where he was, he decided to take a look around. As he walked he passed by an open door, and looking inside, it appeared to be a girl's room. He was about to walk away when he caught sight of himself in a mirror inside the room, and walked towards it to make sure he was seeing things right.

His reflection was not as he remembered, as he was no longer wearing his usual orange and black attire, and instead wore a lavender and cream colored jacket, blue pants, and a headband tied around his neck. His hair had also grown longer, and strange enough, his eyes were now white. "Why am I dressed like Hinata?" he questioned.

112212112.content:
Meanwhile Sakura began coming too; she saw a white face of a massive dog. As her eyes adjusted she noticed it was Akimaru. her head was pounding like someone had just smacked her with a sack of bricks. As she sat there Akimaru whimpered a little and licked her face. Sakura felt disgusted with the dog drool all over her face and sat up quickly whipping the saliva off her face.

After she finished whipping her face off she noticed her sleeves on her coat. She didn’t remember wearing a coat but there it was a black leather jacket sleeve on her arm. She fallowed it down and saw a familiar leather jacket, then saw her black pants and black sandals. She moved her tongue around in her mouth and felt very pronounced canine teeth. Looked at her hands and saw her nails were much longer and shaped like claws instead of her regular nails. Though it looked like she was still a girl she was dressed in Kiba’s clothes. Akimaru barked bringing Sakura’s attention back to him. She noticed that she could to an extent understand what Akimaru was trying to ask with the bark to her it sounded like “are you alright?”

This concerned sakura but she thought it was in her best interest to answer so she said “ ya I am, but my head hurts” Akimaru did a series of whimpers and again sakura vaguely understood what he was getting at being “ sorry I though you would duck when you saw the branch in front of you.” again sakura played along with it and said “ ya something distracted me last minute, but I am fine now.” She thought about it for a minute and realized that scroll must have done this to her. She didn’t even know what happened, but she did have an idea. She looked at Akimaru and said “you know what boy, I am in the mood to see what naruto is doing lets go find him.” Akimaru cocked his head in a confused way then barked “o…..k, why are we going to go find him?” sakura though akumaru would just go with it, now she had to think on her feet coming up with the excuse “well…naruto,,,,,,might know where sakura is and she could look at my head, it is kind of painful.”

Sakura could see that Akumaru was skeptical about why she wanted to go see him but blew it off and stood up waiting for Sakura to climb on him.

After a clumsy mount of akumaru then they were off….

1122122211.content:
As the flash of light died down, and Naruto's vision cleared, he found that he was no longer in the training ground with Sakura, who was nowhere to be seen at the moment. In fact, he was no longer outdoors at all. It didn't take him long to realize just where he was now, though. He had somehow been transported to the Hokage's office, and was now seated behind Tsunade's desk. "Huh? How did I get here?" he questioned out loud. He then started to get up, not wanting the old lady to yell at him if she walked in to find him sitting at her desk. As he started to walk away, he felt that something was different.

Looking down, he discovered just what it was. He was no longer wearing his usual orange and black clothes, but rather different, yet still familar clothes. He wore a green coat, and under it was a gray, sleeveless blouse that showed off his flat chest with a dark blue obi sash tied around his waste, and dark blue pants. On his feet were open-toed heels that showed his toenails were painted with red polish, and he then noticed that his fingernails were also the same way. "What the hell? Why am I dressed like granny?" he asked out loud. Indeed, everything about his state of dress currently was Tsunade's. Though stangely enough, the clothes fit him perfectly, as if they were meant for him and not her.

Wanting to get a better look at himself, he walked over to a nearby mirror, not noticing he had no problem walking in heels, despite never having worn them before, his hips swaying unnoticed as well. In the mirror, he saw his his attire, as well as his face, with pink lipstick on his lips, and a violet colored diamond on his forehead. His hair, while still the same color, was now much longer, and styled into two ponytails with his bangs framing his face. "Just what the hell is going on?" he repeated, taking n the sight of how rediculous he looked.

It was then that someone walked without walking. "I've got some paperwork for you, Lady Tsunade." she said.

"Shizune!?" he let out in surprise.

"Oh, I'm sorry for startling you, Lady Tsunade." Shizune apologized.

"Huh?" 'Does she think I'm Lady Tsunade or something? But how?' he though, taking a seat back at the desk as Shizune placed the paperwork on the desk, continuing to act as if Naruto were Tsunade. He then saw the scroll that he found earlier was sitting on the desk now. 'Does it have something to do with that scroll I found?'
1122122211.title: Naruto with Tsunade, and Sakura with Jiraiya

11221222112.content: In another location in the village, Sakura was also getting her bearing and wondering what was going on. Here she was, dressed like Jiraiya, and she had no idea what was gong on. And even stranger, no one found things to be odd, and a few had even adressed her as Jiraiya. 'Just what is going on?' she thought to herself. She then wondered what to do, and decided to find Naruto. He had been with her before the flash of light, and this happened after he used that jutsu in the scroll so this was his fault.

112212221122.content:
Naruto groaned as he sat in from of the paperwork that Shizune place on the desk. "I know you hate doing it, but you know its still a very important part of your job, Lady Tsunade." Shizune said as she walked towards the door. "I'm going to the hospital for my shift. I'll be back later. And please don't slack off like you usually do." she said, and with that, she left.

Now that Naruto was alone, he stood up and took another look at himself. Here he was dressed like Tsunade, and even though he looked nothing like her, apparently people thought that he really was her. "Man, this is just so weird." he said. He then looked at the scroll that he had found. He wondered just how the jutsu in it had done this. And what about Sakura? She had been nearby when he used it. And what about granny. If he was her, then did that mean she was him?

He then looked at the paperwork. "Ah, forget that. I may not know what happened, but if I'm granny, then that makes me Hokage." he said with a smirk. That was a bright side to this whole situation. "I gotta enjoy this while I can. The stupid paperwork can wait." he said, and with that, he pocketed the scroll and jumped out the window.

Before they could continue to discuss the situation, they heard rustling from behind them, and turned to see two boys approach the. One was about their height, with white hair that had a bluish tint. The other was a large, tall boy with orange hair.

"Ah, here you two are." the shorter of the two said. "Sorry, no luch with the search so far, Sasuke." he said turning to Sakura.

"Huh?" Naruto let out in confusion.

"Whats wrong Karin?" the boy said as he turned to face Naruto now. "Were you so busy trying to seduce Sasuke again that you forgot what we were supposed to be doing?" he taunted.

"What was that!?" Naruto yelled as he punched the boy in the face, his head turning to liquid before reforming.

"Do you always have to start with her, Suigetsu?" the taller boy asked.

'Her?" both Naruto and Sakura thought. Why had this Suigetsu guy called her Sasuke, and Naruto Karin? And had called Naruto a her, despite clearly not being female. And just as strange, these two acted like they knew them, or rather who they thought they were. It was then that Sakura noticed that Naruto was still holding the scroll from earlier. 'Did that jutsu in the scroll do this?' she thought.

1213311.content:
In the Soul Society, deep in the private lab of the Captain of Squad 12, Mayuri Kurotsuchi, was working on his latest experiment. The experiment was a machine that, if his theory was correct, could in effect, transplant the spiritual pressure of one into the other, and vice versa, which in layman's terms could essentially result swapping said people's abilities, or maybe even more.

"...and that should do it." he said as he finished the fine tuning of the machine. "Nemu, get in here." he ordered, and his Lieutenant stepped into the lab.

"Yes?" she asked him.

"I need you assist me so that I can activate the machine so we can begin preparations for testing." he informed her.

"Yes sir."

"Now, press the buttons on the other side of the machine." She walked around to the other side as instructed, and he told her what to do and what to input as he did his own work from his console. Once done, he activated the machine, and its lights turned on as it started up.

Unfortunately, things would not go according to his calculations, and after a few momnets, it began to emit sparks, and suddenly parts of the machine exploded and pieces fell off. Mayuri sighed. "Such a shame. All that effort for naught." Mayuri said. "Oh well, back to the drawing board. Nemu! Clean up the mess!"

"Yes sir." she complied and began to pick up the pieces of.

"Now, lets see, what went wrong in the test?" he commented out loud as he read through his notes on his computer.

However, unknown to him, it the machine caused a strange distortion for an instant, sending a sort of "ripple" through the Soul Society, Karakura Town in the living world, and Hueco Mundo.

---

Meanwhile, in the world of the living, the first to experience the results of Mayuri's failed experiment was none other than Ichigo Kurosaki. Currently, it was morning, and he was still asleep in his bed. As he was lying there, his body was suddenly surrounded by a strange glowing aura, and in an instant, he was replaced by Orihime in his bed. Said girl continued to sleep soundly.

---

Elsewhere, in Orihime's home, Ichigo was just begining to awaken as an alarm clock went off next to the bed he now slept in. Reaching over to turn it off, he was half asleep, and still hadn't realized that he wasn't in his home yet. Absentmindedly walking over to the bathroom, he was glad that he hadn't had to deal with his father this morning.

As he entered the bathroom, he looked at himself in the mirror, and noticed that something was off. "That doesn't look like what I went to bed in..." he said, and then looked down. "WHAT THE HELL!?" he yelled out in shock. For some reason, instead of his usual pajamas, he was now wearing a girl's nightie. "How the hell did I get in this!?" It was then that for the first time that morning, he began to realize that he wasn't in his home. Stepping out of the bathroom, he looked around and recognized the place as Orihime's home. "What am I doing here?"

He then decides to look around the home to see if he could find Orihime and maybe how he got here. As he did, he then noticed something weird. As he passed by some of the pictures in Orihime's home, he had remembered seeing them when he had been here in the past. However, the pictures were not all as he remembered them. For example, there was a picture that had been of her and Tatsuki taken after school one day, where in it the two wore standing next to other. Now however, Orihime wasn't in the picture, but instead he was, and he was wearing her uniform! His expression and posture even matched how hers had been!

"What is going on?" he wondered to himself.
1213311.title: Mayuri's device

choices: They run into the real Orihime on the way to school
12133111.content:
As Ichigo pondered what was going on, he suddenly heard the sound of a knock at the door. "Uh-oh. Who ever that is at the door, I do not want them to see me like this..." he said to himself, looking down at the nightie he was wearing. "What am I gonna do now?" he thought. He obviously had no intention of answering the door.

Unfortunately for him,it didn't look like he woud have a choice, as he watched as the doornob turned, and the door opened, revealing Tatsuki. "Oh sorry, Orihime. I didn't know you weren't dressed." she said. And she said that not as a joke or insult at his current embarrassing state of dress, but sounded casual and a bit apologetic.

Ichigo looked over to Tatsuki, ans studied her expression, which didn't seem to show any hint of a reaction to anything being strange. Now Tatsuki was perhaps his oldest friend, and they had known each other since they were kids, and he knew she'd never be able to stay calm at seeing him like this. Either she'd be laughing her ass off at him wearing the nightie, or be flipping out at him in Orihime's house alone dressed in what he assumed was Orihime's nightie. Either way, he normally would see some kind of reaction. Even if this was some kind of elaborate practical joke, she would have let things slip and burst out laughing by now.However, she showed none. She appeared to be acting normally, and didn't even bat an eye.

"Hey Orihime, you're spacing out again." Tatsuki said, , interupting his thoughts.

"Did she just call me Orihime?" he thought to himself in confusion. And it was then that he started to realize that she had called him Orihime earlier. He then glanced back over to the pictures, in which he had replaced Orihime in all of them. "Have I somehow swapped places with Orihime? How is that even possible!?" he thought to himself.

"Anyway, you should get dressed already, Orihime." Tatsuki said. "We don't want to be late for school.

"Thats right, I've got school today..." Ichigo thought. Altough, from the looks of it, it was looking like he would be going to school as Orihime. "Uh, give me a moment to get ready, Tatsuki."

"No problem."

He then returned to Orihime's room alone, and took off the nightie and threw it into the laundry. After a few minutes, he stepped out of Orihime's room, dressed in Orihime's school uniform. It was strange, because even though he and Orihime were different sizes, all of it seemed to fit him perfectly, as if it had been made for him instead of her. He was also wearing, much to his chagrin, a pair of panties and a bra. The bra was the oddest part, and further proved that he had somehow swapped places with Orihime. Now, Orihime was quite gifted in the chest area, possessing pretty large assests. However, all the bras in her drawer looked to have been made for an extremely flat chested girl rather than someone as busty as Orihime. And if he had to guess, he'd say that all of her clothing now fit him better than they would her.

"You ready?"

"Uh, yeah." he replied as he grabbed Orihime's schoolbag, and the two left, and Ichigo wondered just what the hell was going on.

121331111.content:
As Ichigo made his way to school alongside Tatsuki, he continued to think about what was going on. Here he was, on his way to school, dressed in the girls uniform, with Tatsuki thinking he was Orihime. He couldn't even begin to wrap his head around how this was all possible.

"You alright, Orihime?" Tatsuki asked him. "You've been awfully quiet."

"Huh? Oh, I'm fine Tatsuki." he lied. "I've just been thinking about something is all." All he knew so far is that he and Orihime had somehow swapped places... Wait, if they had swapped places, does that mean that she was "him" right now? Was she currently dressed like him with others thinking that she was Ichigo? "I definitely have to find this out." he thought to himself, now intent on finding out all he could about what had happened to him.

As the two made their way to their destination, it was pure coincidence as they turned a corner, they nearly bumped into none other than the real Orihime arrived, and like he was wearing a girls uniform, she was dressed in the boys uniform.

1213311111.content:
Ichigo stared over at Orihime before him, wearing the boys uniform of their high school. "Oh, hey Ichigo." Tatsuki greeted Orihime.

At that, Orihime frowned. "You too, Tatsuki?" she said. This comment did not go unnoticed by Ichigo.

"Huh? Me too, what?"

"Nothing..." she said with a sigh. It was then that Orihime noticed Ichigo, and her eyes went wide with surprise. "Ichi-?"

Ichigo quickly silence her by covering her mouth. "Uh, Tatsuki? Could you go on ahead for now? I need to talk alone with Ichigo for a moment." Ichigo said.

"Sure. Just don't be late you two." she said before going ahead.

Once she was gone, the two turned to each other. "Ichigo, what is going on? Why does Tatsuki think I'm you? And not just her, but your whole family does too!" Orihime explained.

"I have no idea." Ichigo replied. "She treated me as if I was you, too. And you said my family thinks you were me?" She nodded at his question. "And thats not all. All the pictures in your home, I'm in them all instead of you."

"What, really? Its like we've somehow swapped places or something. I've got your life, and you've got mine." Orihime thought. "What are we going to do, Ichigo?"

"I don't know." Ichigo replied. "I guess for now, lets head to school.

"Okay."
1213311111.title: Orihime is aware of who she really is, and is a...

choices: At school, they meet another that has swapped, but think thats who they are
Meanwhile, with Rukia as Renji in the Soul Society
12133111111.content:
As Ichigo and Orihime pondered about their current situation and what they were going to do about it as the two made their way to school. They wondered if they could even get anyone to help them, as it seemed as far as anyone else was concerned, they were each other, and it appeared it had always been that way.

As they did, they were met by a strange sight. It was someone they both recognized well, one of their friends, but the strange thing was what they were wearing. "Is that...?" Ichigo started.

"Renji?" Orihime let out in surprise. Indeed, said person was Renji Abarai, the lieutenant of Squad 6, and their close comrade. But he, like Ichigo, was currently wearing the girls uniform of their high school, and looking both very confused and very embartassed.

The two exchanged glances, both having a feeling that they knew what was going on. "Hey, Renji!"

Getting his attention, Renji hesitantly turned to face them, and was surprised when he saw them. "Ichigo? What the hell are you wearing?" he said with a laugh.

"Hey, I wouldn't be talking if I were you!" Ichigo denfended.

"Oh, uh, right." he said, recalling what he was wearing. "Uh, do either of you two know what is going on?"

"We're not quite sure either." Orihime replied. "But when we woke up today, in each other's homes, everyone seems to be treating us as if we're the other. And things

"People think you're each other? That might explain a few things."

"Huh? What do you mean?" Ichigo asked.

"Your friend Tatsuki passed me by not too long ago. She said hi, but called me Rukia."

"She thought you're Rukia?" Orihime asked.

"Yeah. A few minutes ago, I was back in the Soul Society, minding my own business. Then suddenly, there was a flash of light, and when my vision cleared, I was here and dressed like this much to my ambarrassment. Then Tatsuki passed me, and before I could say anything, she said "Hey Rukia" and kept going as if nothing happened, and leaving me even more confused."

"So then you're "Rukia" to everyone now, right? That means that Rukia is back in Soul Society now as you." Ichigo said.

"We should probably try to get in contact with her after school." Orihime said.

"Yeah." Ichigo said. "And now we know that this is happening to more people than just me and Orihime."
12133111111.title: On the way to school, they encounter someone el...

choices: Rukia finds more swapped Soul Reapers
Meanwhile, in the World of the Living
121331111112.content:
Rukia opened her eyes after being met by a blinding light when she arrived at school. When she looked around, she noticed she was in the Soul Society, specifically the Squad 6 barracks. Wondering how she had gotten there, Rukia failed to notice Byakuya Kuchiki standing behind her.

"Is there something wrong?" Byakuya asked sternly.

Rukia turned and immediately bowed, saying, "N...No, nothing."

"Then why are you wasting time standing around, Renji? You need to get to the Lieutenant's meeting."

"What is Byakuya talking about?" Rukia thought. "I'm not Renji, so why did he..." She cut herself off when she noticed that she wasn't wearing the clothes she had been a while ago. She stood wearing a Soul Reaper's uniform, but with the Squad 6 Lieutenant's badge on her left arm. On her waist was a Zanpaku-to, but she could tell that it wasn't Sode no Shirayuki, but rather Renji's Zabimaru.

"Renji, quit wasting time and get going." Byakuya said, raising his voice only slightly.

"R...Right away," Rukia said as she flash-stepped toward the building where the Lieutenants met. Along the way, she kept thinking, "What just happened here? I need to get to the bottom of this."
121331111112.title: Meanwhile, with Rukia as Renji in the Soul Society

1213311111122.content:
Back in the world of the living, Ichigo, Orihime, and Renji had arrived at school. It was still strange for them to be in the situation, being viewed as someone else by the rest of the world, and one of the opposite gender at that.

"This is gonna be weird." Ichigo said. Until now, his and Renji's only interaction had been with Tatsuki. But at school, there would be a lot more people treating them as Orihime and Rukia respectively.

"I know what you mean." he said. They both felt uncomfortable being here in the girls uniform. And since despite who people treated them, they still had their normal bodies, so they knew how ridicuous they would normally look like this.

"Good morning, Orihime!"

"Gooood morning, Ichi-"

As per usual, their friends Keigo and Chizuru were ready to greet Ichigo and Orihime respectively, though things would be reversed today. Ichigo felt a pair of arms wrap aroung his chest as he was greeted as Orihime. As that happened, a voice was cut off as Orihime, without paying much attention, raised her hand into a fist and struck someone in the facr, cutting off the one who had been running at her to greet her as Ichigo.

"Get off Orihime, Chizuru!" Tatsuki said as she kicked someone off of Ichigo.

Ichigo and Orihime were surprised by what has just happened. When he had felt someone grab him, Ichigo had been surprised, and a bit too surprised to act as he normally would when Keigo would greet him. But Orihime had the opposite reaction, and had stopped her own greeter, and had done so as if it was a reflex.

"Uh, guys." Renji said, getting their attentions. "You might want to see who those two were."

"Huh?" they said in unison, both confused by what he said. But when they looked behind them, they saw exactly what he meant. Each morning, they would be greeted by their friends Keigo and Chizuru, and those two had indeed been who greeted them, but they were not as they normally would be. Chizuru was currently lying on the ground by Orihime's feet, and she was wearing the school's boys uniform and didn't have her glasses on. And Keigo was currently lying on the ground under Tatsuki's foot, wearing the girls uniform, and even had Chizuru's glasses on his face.

"Chizuru?" Orihime questioned quietly.

"Keigo?" Ichigo questioned.

After a moment, Chizuru got up and looked to Orihime. "Why do you always do that, Ichigo?" she complained.

"Uh..." she wasn't sure what to say.

"Because you're annoying, Asano." another of their friend, Mizuiro said as he came up to them, Chad silently following.

"Hey, stop calling me by my last name!" she complained to him

"I told you to stop doing that to Orihime, Chizuru!" Tatsuki yelled to Keigo as she took her foot of of him and he got up.

"You can't stop me. My passion is too strong to be dissuaded by your strength!" Keigo said in response, which earned him another kick from Tatsuki.

Ichigo, Orihime, and Renji were speechless as they watched in confusion. Like with them, it looked like Keigo and Chizuru had swapped places with one another. But unlike with them, they were acting like and actually believed that they were who they swapped with! Keigo believed he was the proud lesbian Chizuru, and Chizuru believed she was the goofy and hyperactive Keigo.

"Things just keep getting weirder..." Ichigo thought to himself.
1213311111122.title: Meanwhile, in the World of the Living

choices: Back in the World of the Living...
12133111111222.content:
Back in the Soul Society, Rukia had made her way to the Lieutenants meeting. And her trip there had been quite the odd one. Like with Byakuya, everyone was treating her as if she was Renji. "I wonder if Renji is in the World of the Living in a similar situation?" she thought to herself.

When she arrived at the Lietenants meeting, she entered. "Hey Renji." Rangiku greeted her.

"Hey, Rangiku." Rukia replied. Looking around, she saw most of the other lieutenants were already there. The only ones missing were "Rukia", who was in the world of the living, and Yachiru and Nanao. Rukia then took Renji's seat and thought about what was going on.

"Hi everybody!" a voice with a cheerful and childish tone greeted everyone. Rukia assume that Yachiru, the young Lietenant of Squad 11 had arrived. Though she thought something was really off about the voice.

"Hello, Yachiru." someone greeted her back.

When Rukia turned to see the young girl, she was met with surprise. Instead of seeing Yachiru, she instead saw Nanao! She watched as Nanao ran over and took Yachiru's seat. She was wearing the normal uniform, but with the badge from the 11th Squad. Her glasses were also msiing from her face, and in her hair she also had the crossbone hairclip that Yachiru had begun to wear lately. And she also seemed to have the same blush on her cheeks that Yachiru always had. As she sat their, she happily ate the snacks that were on the table, a habit that Yachiru had.

As she "Sorry I'm late." she heard someone say, and turned to see Yachiru walk calmly into the room. "I had to do some things for my captain." she said.

"Its alright, Lietenant Ise." Izuru said. "You're exactly on time."

Yachiru currently wore the standard uniform, now with the Squad 8 badge on her arm. She also had on a pair of glasses, which were the same one Nanao always wore, and was carrying a large book in her arms as Nanao often did.

"Lietenant Abarai, what are you staring at?" Yachiru asked Rukia.

"Oh, nothing." Rukia replied.

"Then please stop staring at me like that." Yachiru said, then looked around. "I see Lietenant Kuchiki is still in the World of the Living. Now, lets see, the first oder of business is..." she said as the meeting began, and Rukia noticed that Nanao was barely paying attention, if at all.

Rukia was dumbfounded by what she was seeing. Here was Yachiru, the childish, carefree and energetic young girl acting serious and calm. And then there was Nanao, who was acting nothing like her usual serious self, and was acting childishy and shirking off her responsibilities. And no one else noticed as they seemed to think that Yachiru and Nanao were each other, just as everyone else seemed to think she was Renji, though unlike her, they actually believed that was who they were.

"I've gotta get to the World of the Living and see if I can find Renji..." she thought to herself.
12133111111222.title: Back in Soul Society...

choices: Meanwhile, back in the World of the Living...
121331111112221.content:
As the meeting went on, Rukia wasn't sure what to make of this whole situation. Here she was, apparently being viewed as Renji by other people. And then there was Nanao and Yachiru, who were viewed as each other similarly to her situation, but they actually believed they were each other as well! She watched as Nanao payed little attention to the meeting as she ate the snacks on the table, while Yachiru . Everyone except her was completely oblivious to the strange and sureal situation.

"Lieutenant Abarai?"

Having zoned out from her thoughts, she wasn't paying much attention. She was also not used to answering to Renji's name. Rukia continued thinking about just what was going on.

"Lieutenant Abarai!"

Hearing the person addressing her that time, "Huh? What?" she let out in confusion.

"You haven't ben paying attention to the entire meeting." Yachiru said, adjusting Nanao's glasses on her face. "And you seem to have been staring at me and Lieutenant Kusajishi the whole time."

"Oh, I was? Sorry about that." Rukia replied.

"If you're not feeling well, maybe you should go to Squad 4 and get yourself chacked out."

"Maybe." Rukia said.

"Why don't I take you there and take a look at you, Renji?" Isane suggested.

"Uh, sure." Rukia agreed, and the two left the meeting and went to Squad 4's facilities. Inside

"So, is everything alright, Renji?" Isane asked him.

"I guess I've just got something else on my mind." Rukia replied truthfully. She was pretty sure that nothing was wrong with her, but this whole situation had her confused, and wondering what she was going to do. "Say Isane, have you noticed anything strange lately? Like say, about me, or maybe Lietenant Ise or Kusajishi, or anyone?"

"Strange? No, not really. Like what?"

"I don't know. Don't worry about it, then."

As she thought of what to do, there was suddenly a bright flash next to her, and she turned to see that Isane was no longer next to her, and had instead been replaced by Hanataro Yamada. He also now had Squad 4's Lieutenant's badge on his arm, and Isane's thin, red earings dangling from his ears. "Well, you seem perfectly okay, Renji." Hanataro said. He seemed to be completely unaware that anything was off.

"Uh, thanks, Lieutenant Ise."

"It was no problem at all, Renji." he replied, confirming Rukia's suspicion that he now believed that he was Isane.

"I really need to get to the bottom of what is going on." Rukia thought to herself.
121331111112221.title: The meeting continues

choices: Ichigo, Orihime, and Renji start to investigate things
Meanwhile, with Tatsuki as Nelliel in Hueco Mundo
1213311111122212.content:
Meanwhile, back in the world of the living, Ichigo, Orihime, and Renji sat in their classroom, listening to the teacher's lesson. As class went on, they thought about their current situation. Ichigo, currently sitting in Orihime's usual seat, looked over to Orihime sitting in his own usual seat. Ichigo looked to the seat next to him where Tatsuki sat. As with this morning, she still thought he was Orihime, and so did everyone else.

It had been weird thus far, with everyone but the three of them believing that they were omeone else. And it was just as weird to see Keigo and Chizuru in a similar situation, but believing they were each other. It had also been a bit uncomfortable for Ichigo, as just as Chizuru would behave around Orihime, Keigo was acting around him. He had already made a few more attempts at "groping" him, though thankfully, Tatsuki was there to get him off of him. But Ichigo was confused as to why he seemed to be "off" and didn't seem to be able to react to him like he normally could.

As for Renji, along with being viewed as if he was Rukia, he aslo had to deal with having to be in class. Now this wasn't the first time he had been in Ichigo's school, but it was the first time he actually had to participate in class. And he really didn't like it.

And as for Orihime, she was trying to work, but could seem to focus. It was weird enough that it had happened to her and Ichigo, and stranger when she found out they weren't alone and it had happened to Renji and Rukia. And it was stranger still with the situation with Keigo and Chizuru. It made her wonder, what if it happened to anyone else? And what if it kept happening?

As class went on, and Ichigo sat in his seat, there was suddenly a bright flash to his side, and when he turned to see what it was, he saw that Tatsuki, who had been sitting next to him moments ago, was no longer there. In her place was now a very familiar person; the Arrancar Nelliel! She was in her adult form, and now wearing the normal girl's uniform, and the mask that should have been on top of her head currently wasn't there. Noticing him staring, Nelliel looked over to him. "Something wrong, Orihime?" she asked him.

"Uh, no, I'm fine." Ichigo replied. "So she thinks she is Tatsuki?" he thought. He then looked over to Orihime and Renji, and he knew that they had noticed everything too. But they were evidently the only ones, as just like with them, no one racted in the slightest to the sudden change.
1213311111122212.title: Meanwhile, back in the World of the Living...

choices: During the meal with Hiyori and Mashiro
Afterwards, Ichigo and Orihime meet with Urahara, and Renji and Rukia meet up
12133111111222121.content:
Later in the day when school ended, the three agreed, wordlessly and unanimously, that they needed to start investigating this weird phenomenon.

"Hey, I think I'm gonna go back to the Soul Society and check up on Rukia." Renji said. "If I'm her, then she is me. I'm gonna see if she is as aware as us. And I'm also gonna check to see if there are any other people affected there."

"Okay. Me and Orihime will check around Karakura Town while you do that." Ichigo said.

"Good luck, Renji." Orihime said. "And if Rukia is aware like us, make sure you tell her about whats going on here."

"Will do." Renji agreed. And with that, the red head parted ways with the two of them.

As the two started walking, they realized that they didn't really know what to do. "Now what?" Ichigo said.

"Well, I'm not sure." Orihime said. "Maybe we could try taking to Urahara about this."

"Maybe. But would he believe us?"

"I don't know. But if he doesn't, maybe we could try to get him to believe us."

"But how would we do that? I mean, its like reality itself has altered with this whole weird thing. Back in your house, all the picture of you had me in your place instead."

"This is gonna be hard, but maybe we should at least try?"

"Yeah, I guess we could." Ichigo agreed. As the two walked down the street, they felt their stomachs grumble, letting them know that they were hungry. "Hey, lets get something to eat first though. My house is nearby, so lets stop by there. We'll go to Urahara's afterwards."

"Okay." Orihime agreed, and the two turned the corner and walked towards the Kurosaki residence.

"Just remember, everyone thinks we're each other, so answer to my name when my sisters address you. And announce that we're there." Ichigo reminded her.

"Right." As the two entered in, Orihime did as he had said. "Hey, its me. Uh, just stopping by for a moment."

"Hey Ichigo!" a voice with a friendly tone greeted. It didn't sound like either of his sisters, but they did think it sounded familiar. When they entered the kitchen, they were surprised to see Hiyori Sarugaki of the Visored wearing the sailor fuku uniform of Yuzu and Karin's school. She was currently by the stove, and looked to be cooking some food. She was acting much differently than normal, and rather thank her usually aggressive and short-tempered attitude, she was acting much more calm, and had a much friendlier demeanor. "Oh, hello, Orihime. I didn' know you were stopping by with my brother as well." she said as she saw Ichigo. "Lucky I just started, I'll make some extra for you if you want to join us."

"Uh, thanks." Ichigo and Orihime exchanged glances. "So now Yuzu and Hiyori have swapped as well?" they thought.

"Orihime is here as well, huh?" a new voice said as someone entered the room. Turning to see who it was, they saw another of the Visored, Mashiro Kuna. Like Hiyori, she also was currently wearing the sailor fuku uniform of Yuzu and Karin's school. Unlike her usual childish self, she was actually calm right now, and had a bored expression on her face that looked pretty odd on her. She walked over to the fridge and took a can of soda out and took a sip from it. "Hey Ichigo." she said casually as hse sat at the table.

For Ichigo, it was quite the odd sight. Not only because his younger sister had swapped, but who they had swapped with. He knew both Hiyori and Mashiro well enough to know that they were pretty different from his sisters they had swapped with. So it was weird seeing Hiyori think she was Yuzu and act like her, and the same for Karin and Mashiro. And it was just as odd for Orihime.
12133111111222121.title: Ichigo, Orihime, and Renji start to investigate...

choices: Ichigo and Orihime speak with Urahara, and Renji and Rukia speak with Mayuri
Before they can meet with him the substitue badge alerts them to a hollow attack
121331111112221212.content:
A little bit after the strange dinner, Ichigo and Orihime left and were back on their way to Urahara's. "That was really weird." Orihime said. "It was gonna be weird enough having your sisters treat me as you, but Hiyori as Yuzu and Mashiro as Karin was even weirder than that."

"Yeah, I know what you mean." Ichigo agreed. He hoped his sisters would be okay. "But lets get to Urahara's for now. And lets hope that we can convince him of what is going on."

"Yeah."

-----

Back in the Soul Socoiety, Renji had arrived back. When he had left the gigai, he had found that his usual robes were slightly alter in the way Rukia wore hers. He also had Squad 13's badge, and Rukia's sealed Sode no Shirayuki at his side. It was also pretty weird as he was being addressed as "Lieutenant Kuchiki" by people.

Wandering around, he wondered where Rukia might be. And as if to answer his silent question, he saw the familiar short figure of his oldest friend turn a corner. "Hey!" he called out to her, and she turned to see him, and was surprised based off of her expression. Not sure if she was aware of the situation, he chose his words carefully. "Hey, uh, Renji. I just got back and was wondering if you noticed anything, uh, strange lately."

"Strange? Like what? Maybe about you?" Rukia asked.

"Yeah! So then..."

"Yeah, I've noticed, Renji." she said.

"Thank god. I was getting worried you might think you were me, Rukia." he said.

"No, but we're not the only people experiencng this strange phenomenon."

"I know. Ichigo and Orihime are also in the same boat as us with each other." Renji told her.

"Ichigo and Orihime too?" Rukia said, snickering a bit at the mental image of Ichigo dressed as Orihime. "Not just them, either. Nanao and Yachiru have also swapped and believe that they're each other, and the same is true about Isane and Hanataro."

"I know of two other sets from when I was in the World of the Living. Keigo Asano and Chizuru Honsho have swapped places and believe that they are one another, and Tatsuki swapped with that Arrancar girl Nelliel."

"So thats at least 6 different swaps so far."

"That we're aware of." Renji added. "Who knows of whoever else could have been affected. Just look at with us swappng places even though we were both in different worlds at the time, and the same for Tatsuki and Nelliel. Theres no telling what could happen and who could swap with who."

"You're right."

"So then what should we do?"

Rukia thought a few minutes. "I'd rather not, but it might be best that we speak to Captain Kurotsuchi about this." she suggested.

"I guess its worth a try..." Renji said.

-----

Back in the World of the Living, Ichigo and Orihime had just arrived at Urahara's shop. "So, how should we go about this?" Orihime asked.

"I'm not sure." Ichigo said, thinking about the best way to go about things.
121331111112221212.title: Afterwards, Ichigo and Orihime meet with Urahar...

choices: Follow Ichigo and Orihime for now
Follow Rukia and Renji for now
1213311111122212121.content:
Entering into the shop, the two looked around and saw Urahara inside. "Ichigo, Orihime. To what do I owe the pleasure?"

"Urahara, need to talk to you about something." Ichigo said.

"About what?"

"Well, lets see, how to put this..." Ichigo said before he and Orihime began to tell him about the current strange events.

-----

"Captain Kurotsuchi, could we speak with you about something?" Renji asked the strange man.

"What is it?"

"Well, you see, we think something strange is going on." Rukia said.

"And what would that be?"

Exchanging glanes, Renji and Rukia began to tell the captain about what was going on.

-----

"Hm, well, the analysis did find something odd that should verify your story." Urahara said, having just finished running some tests on Ichigo and Orihime.

"So you believe us?" Orihime asked.

"I've got no reason not to." Urahara said.

"So what is it?" Ichigo asked.

"There are two slight anomaly in your reiatsu where you both have a very trace amount of each other's as part of your own, or should I say, a very trace amount of your own as part of the other's."

"Huh?" Ichigo said in confusion.

"Well, first, lets say you are telling the truth, whatever it is that happened to you both was very thorough in its effects. I assume you both haven't noticed yet, but you both currently have the others reiatsu, with only a very slight and normally undetectable amount of your own remaining as part of it."

"I see." Orihime said. "And what is the other?"

"Well, there is also traces of an unknown energy having affected you both.

-----

"Lets see... Nope, nothing odd with the both of you." Mayuri Kurotsuchi said as he looked over a paper with the results of the tests he had just ran on the two lieutenants.

"Nothing at all?" Rukia said.

"Nothing. If you ask me, you both seem pretty delusional."

"I see." Renji said. "Thank you for the time, Captain Kurotsuchi." And with that, the two left.

As soon as they left, Mayuri was back at his computer. "My, how fascinating! To think that my machine actually succeeded earlier! Of course, its effects are currently too strong and is uncontrolable, but things are much more interesting right now!" he said typing up on his computer. He had lied to Rukia and Renji before. While examining the two, he had detected the strange energy traces on them, and it was the exact same he had discovered a spike of from his machine before it failed.

After a few moments, some data appeared on his screen. "Ah, I see. The machine has caused a distortion which is giving the same readings as the traces of strange energy that those two had. Now, lets see... It looks like the distortion is linked between Karakura Town in the World of the Living, here in the Soul Society, and even in Hueco Mundo."

After a few moments, he had a liquid pour out from a nearby machine and he used a syringe to inject it into himself. "There. Now, lets see." He pressed a few buttons and a pair of of videoo screens displayed similar pictures. During the examination, he had placed his video microbes in both of the two lieutenants, and could now use them as some of his means to examine the effects. "Ah, good, it worked. I can now see those two for who the really are." The liquid in the syringe had two effects. Like with Rukia, Renji, Ichigo, and Orihime, he could now see people as who they really were instead of the life they were in. And the other effect was that it had made him immune to the effects of the distortion, so he wouldn't be swapping with anyone.

"Now, lets see who else might come under effect." he said as he began devising a way that would detect each swap as it happened."

-----

"So, what should we do for now?"

"I'm not sure at the moment." Urahara replied. "Its gonna take some time to analyze this phenomenon. I guess for now all you can do is continue on as each other, and keep an eye out for any more swaps, and watch those also affected."

Ichigo sighed at the fact that he was stuck like this for now. As he contemplated what to do, there was suddenly a bright flash in front of him and Orihime, and when it died down, Urahara was no longer in front of them, and had been replaced by Yoruichi. She was now dressed as Urahara, and from the looks of things, didn't notice anything strange.

"Something wrong you two?"

"Yeah, turns out there was just another swap, and it was you this time." Ichigo said.

"Really? I don't feel any different, and I didn't notice anything. I feel like Urahara. Who am I supposed to be?"

"Yoruichi." Orihime told him.

"Really? Well, this does give me some extra data to examine someone who has swapped but doesn't notice. I'll also get in touch with Yoruichi and fill her in. Or should I say, I'll get in touch with Urahara and fill him in."

"Yeah. Anyway, we'll get going. Let us know if you find anything out, Yoru... hara?" Ichigo said, not sure how to address her before he and Orihime left.
1213311111122212121.title: Ichigo and Orihime speak with Urahara, and Renj...

12133111111222121211.content:
As Ichigo and Orihime left, they wandered about the streets, not really sure where to go or what to do. "What are we going to do now, Ichigo?" Orihime asked.

Ichigo sighed. "I really don't know, Orihime." he replied. "I mean, for now we're stuck like this and theres not much we can do."

As the two walked, they suddenly heard a loud noise, the source of which was coming from an object Orihime currently had in her possession: Ichigo's Substitute Shinigami badge.

The two looked at one another. "What are we going to do?" Orihime asked.

Ichigo looked at her, then the Substitute Shinigami badge, and then at the hair clips attatched to the collar of the uniform he currently wore. "We've got to fight it."

"But how?"

"I think it should be pretty obvious we've probably got each other's powers. We'll just have to use them."

"Well, okay." Orihime said. Using the power of the badge, she felt the sudden sensation as he spirit left her physical body. Her spirit body was currently dressed in Ichigo's personal Soul Reaper robes, including the newer details it had gotten when he had regained his Soul Reaper powers. And on her back was his newer Zangetsu, and despite its size compared to her frame, she didn't seem to have any problems with it being too heavy for her. "It looks like I really do have your powers." she said, noting how different they felt from her own. She felt stronger than she ever had before.

As for Ichigo, recalling his training on how to use Fullbring, drew upon that knowledge to activate what were now his powers, and activated her Shun Shun Rikka. "C'mon, it not too far." Running to the location, they saw a few hollows, all of which looked to be pretty weak and mindless ones. Orihime had gotten there first thanks to being faster now, though she had gone slow enough for Ichigo to keep up. When they arrived, Orihime immediately cut one down. "Koten Zanshun!" Ichigo called out, sending the attack at the nearest hollow.
12133111111222121211.title: Follow Ichigo and Orihime for now

121331111112221212112.content:
(Somewhere in the Soul Society)

"Well, we asked Captain Kurotsuchi. Now what?" Rukia asked as she and Renji traversed the Soul Society without any real destination.

"I don't know. Maybe we should just play it cool for the time being. Maybe whatever's happening is just temporary and it'll wear off."

"I hope you're right, Renji," Rukia said with a defeated look on her face

(At Mayuri's Lab)

Mayuri was laughing his butt off at the current situation. "This is just too entertaining! Here I thought my little experiment last night was just a dud, but now I see it works like a charm. Nemu, get in here and write down these results right away!!"

"Yes, Master. As you command," came an immediate response. However, Mayuri knew from experience that it wasn't Nemu who answered him. Looking back, se saw...
121331111112221212112.title: Meanwhile, with Rukia and Renji...

1213311111122212121121.content:
Retsu Unohana stared at Kurotsuchi, her face not showing any kind of emotion. "Master, is there something wrong with me?" Unohana replied, signifying her new identity as Nemu.

Mayuri grinned and said, "No, nothing at all. In fact, I believe it's time for your tune up. Follow me to my lab, Nemu."

Unohana nodded slightly and replied, "As you command, Master."

(Thirty minutes later)

Mayuri stared at Unohana's naked body suspended in a pod while he waited for the test results. "This is a suiting revenge for someone like you who doesn't appreciate the science I do in order to protect everyone," he thought.

When the results were printed, Mayuri opened the pod, allowing Unohana to drop to the ground while he went over them. After a long bit of silence, Unohana put the last of her (Nemu's) clothes on and asked, "Is there something wrong, Master?"

"Yes. According to my memory, the body you now currently possess belongs to Captain Unohana, yet your spiritual pressure still remains that of Nemu Kurotsuchi. Apparently, my machine decided to make whoever swapped swap completely. Right now, despite your body belonging to Captain Unohana, you are, at the core, Nemu Kurotsuchi!"

Unohana bowed her head and said, "No matter whose body I might possess, I will continue to love and serve you, Master." Mayuri simply grinned and looked at the tv screen, currently displaying the sight of Renji Abarai and Rukia Kuchiki. "I wonder what new surprises are in store for us."
1213311111122212121121.title: Captain Unohana living Nemu's life

121331112.content: Now, Ichigo and Orihime may have been the first affected by this strange phenominon, but they would not be the only ones. As Ichigo and Tatsuki made their way to school, two others in another location were surrounded by a strange aura and were suddenly swapped as Ichigo and Orihime had been.

125.title: Life swaps between Bleach and another anime

1252.content:
It was a relatively peaceful day for Ichigo as he made his way to school. Nothing had really been going on so things had been pretty boring. He let out a yawn as he noticed Uryu walking on the other side of the street, they nodded to eachother in acknowledgement. Continuing along

"Good morning Ichigo!" Orihime greeted him cheerfully with a wave. Jogging over to him, she noticed Uryu and waved to him as well. "Good morning to you too, Uryu!" Who waved back but said nothing.

"Good morning, Orihime." Ichigo greeted her. "Not with Tatsuki today?"

"No, she went to school early for karate club stuff." she said. "Hey Uryu! Why don't you come over here and walk with us?" she called over to him.

"Thats alright, I'm fine." he replied and continued on his way.

"Suit yourself!"

Before the two could contiue, they heard someone call out to them. "Hey! Ichigo! Orihime!" Turning around, they saw Rukia and a group of other shinigami.

"Hey guys!" Renji greeted with her. The group of shinigami consisted of familiar faces. Other than Rukia and Renji, there was Izuru, Hisagi, Momo, Rangiku, Toshiro, and Soi Fon.

"Oh, hey." Ichigo greeted. "What are you all doing here?"

"We were heading to Urahara's." Rukia said. "We were bringing something to him to examine."

"Must be important to require all of you." Ichigo commented.

"What is it?" Orihime asked.

"We don't know. The Head Captain gave us the package and told us to bring it to him. We weren't given details." Toshiro said as he held up a black box.

"I wonder whats in it?"

"Is it dangerous?" Ichigo questioned, and received shrugs. He sighed. "I've got a bad feeling about this. Maybe we should come with you guys just in case."

----------

"Ah, you're right on time." Urahara greeted the shinigami from the doorway of his shop with Yoruichi next to him. "Oh? IPluto see you brought Ichigo,and Orihime with you guys."

"We ran into them on their way here and tagged along."

"Well, come in and I'll have a look at what you brought me." he said and everyone followed him into the shop. Inside, Toshiro handed hi the black box. Opening it, he was met with an interesting sight. "Hm? Whats this?" he said as he lifted it up out of the box for everyone to see. It was a round, pink object with a crescent moon symbol on it. They could all feel a strange energy coming from it.

"What is that?" Ichigo asked.

"I have no idea. I've never seen something like this or felt this kind of energy before." Urahara said. "I'll have to run some tests on it-" he was the cut off as the object began to glow brightly.

"What the heck? Whats going on?" Ichigo asked.

"What did you do?" Renji said. The light the grew so bright that it engulfed the entire room, and all of those in it.

----------
